text: ivarkalutaiya utaranam or utaranattai ottirukkiratu. (Atavatu apayakaramana kattil, karirulil akappattuk kontavarkalukku valiyai arivippatarkaka) oruvar tiyai mutti (atanal) avaraic cula oli erpatta camayattil (avarkalutaiya tiya ceyalkalin karanamaka) allah avarkalutaiya (parvai) oliyaip pokki parkka mutiyata karirulil avarkalai vittu vittan
